name: osu!
subtitle: rhythm is just a *click* away!
description:
An AltStore and derivatives source for the rhythm game osu!.

Source made by apix and hosted at https://apikusu.github.io/altstore.

Updated daily at 00:30 and 12:30 UTC.

Banner/header:
- Artist: Maqmoon (https://osu.ppy.sh/users/33452645)
- URL: https://assets.ppy.sh/user-contest-entries/16255/3fa2128c0f1a6d6b70b5c3e5cbfb4e3624f283ee027fdf95b6c6ce0de0286329_opt.jpg

apps.name: osu!
apps.subtitle: A free-to-win rhythm game. Rhythm is just a *click* away!
apps.localizedDescription:
This is the future – and final – iteration of the osu! game client which marks the beginning of an open era!

Currently known by and released under the release codename "lazer". As in sharper than cutting-edge.

versions.localizedDescription:
## What's Changed
* Ensure all mod types are `public` by @minisbett in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34684
* Refactor notification avatar to remove `OnUpdate` by @smoogipoo in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34668
* SongSelectV2: Fix rewind triggering on right-clicking and dragging away from random button by @person4268 in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34704
* Fix BPM grouping mode not defining a group for 290 - 300 BPM range by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34725
* Fix even more issues with replay fail indicator by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34721
* Add aim error meter skin component by @cdwcgt in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/25716
* Use fallback icon in `PanelBeatmap` if ruleset is not found by @LumpBloom7 in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34710
* Add verify check for inconsistent audio usage by @Hiviexd in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34666
* Exclude all beatmap audios from the hitsounds format check by @Hiviexd in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34667
* Add skin support for sliderpoint10 and sliderpoint30 by @cl8n in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34606
* Fix leaderboard not resizing correctly by @frenzibyte in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34643
* Fix submission & rank date backpopulation failing every launch for some users by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34752
* Fix song select background being stuck in revealed state by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34759
* Refresh realm before performing song select refetches following an online metadata lookup by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34723
* Update mod icons by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34757
* Pull up online beatmap set lookup to song select level to avoid two components doing the same fetch independently by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34766
* Fix flashlight not always matching gameplay scaling by @frenzibyte in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34761
* Fix aim error meter applying incorrect scaling constant in normalised mode by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34794
* Fix daily challenge / playlist leaderboard sometimes showing incorrect default state by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34800
* Fix crash on exiting `ReplayPlayer` is beatmap was not loaded successfully by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34801
* Work around excessive refreshes of carousel beatmap set panel backgrounds by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34802
* Update framework by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34803
* Fix beatmap panels locally handling mod and ruleset changes unnecessarily by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34809
* Fix `HealthProcessor` potentially incorrectly reverting failed state by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34812
* Preserve pre-post notification completion target by @smoogipoo in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34818
* Always use audio from maximised player if there is one in multiplayer spectator by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34740
* Fix beatmap carousel triggering full filters more often than it needs to by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34808
* Add long note percentage filter for mania mode by @genskyff in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34774
* Use switches for warmup/chat toggles in tournament interface by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34834
* Fix some mods showing tooltips when settings are default by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34833
* Fix hitobject drawables becoming visible 1 frame too late by @minetoblend in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34830
* Support beatmap sets being split apart by the active group mode in beatmap carousel by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34822
* Fix song select not performing online lookup on re-enter by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34836
* Adjust interpolation workaround to catch-up slightly smoother by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34841
* Add footer to `ScreenTestScene` by @smoogipoo in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34837
* Add support for pinning multiplayer rooms by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34764
* Fix excess requests leading to queueing / delays of updating metadata at song select by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34882
* Fix rotation & scale popovers crashing on dismissal via keyboard when simultaneously dragging sliders by @NiyazBiyaz in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34873
* Fix multiplayer lobby being unusable on mobile by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34885
* Add increase visibility setting for taiko hidden by @kptach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34879
* Fix editor memory leak by @smoogipoo in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34887
* Fix gameplay freezing on stutter frames / long load times by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34890
* Fix potential loss of room events during join by @smoogipoo in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34819
* Ignore `.osu` files not placed at top level of beatmap archive on import by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34893
* Fix crash when trying to test map in the editor by @minetoblend in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34880
* Adjust fail handling in multiplayer spectator player to permit showing F rank by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34891
* Download online beatmap / present local beatmap on shift-clicking beatmap cards by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34892
* Add secondary keys for osu!mania by @kptach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34867
* Update framework by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34902
* Allow beatmaps to show up multiple times in the carousel if grouping criteria requires it by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34842
* Fix external edit operations failing due to invalid filenames by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34900
* Add argon style judgement counter by @LukynkaCZE in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/32297
* Treat guest user scores & scores of unknown users as the local user's by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34904
* Fix not being able to report users from playlists chat by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34911
* Add matchmaking model types required for server-side deploy by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34912
* Fix song select debounce not handling long (stutter) frames well by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34903
* Fix errors on exiting from editor if there are no more beatmaps remaining for the ruleset active in song select by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34914
* Replace MatchmakingSettings with MatchmakingPool by @smoogipoo in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34917
* Fix `rank-up` and `rank-down` sounds playing too often in some scenarios by @NiyazBiyaz in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34905
* Fix external edit filename sanitising unintentionally dropping folder separators by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34945
* Fix sheared dropdown click sound area by @Joehuu in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34948
* Change debounce method in rank display to allow more immediate updates by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34952
* Fix `ArgonJudgementCounterDisplay` not showing colored numbers when "Show label" is off by @Joehuu in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34932
* Add "retro" default skin by @cl8n in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34920
* Adjust BPM filtering at song select to be less precise by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34956
* Make DrawableDate formatting localizable by @CloneWith in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34910
* Fix mangled initial undo state on fresh skins by @smoogipoo in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34958
* Fix beatmap carousel not holding selection after refilter in some cases by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34966

## New Contributors
* @person4268 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34704
* @genskyff made their first contribution in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34774
* @NiyazBiyaz made their first contribution in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34873

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ppy/osu/compare/2025.816.0-lazer...2025.912.0-lazer

## What's Changed
* Adjust song select sizing in response to user feedback by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34132
* Use difficulty background on standalone beatmap panels by @Joehuu in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34151
* Add more predefined divisors to match stable by @Hiviexd in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34178
* Write new name to `skin.ini` when renaming skin via settings by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34125
* Support `.ogg`-specific bitrate limit in audio quality verify check by @Hiviexd in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34182
* Fix multiplayer spectator leaderboard respecting "show leaderboard" config setting by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34204
* Fix text flow arbitrary drawable wrapper accessing child in an unsafe manner by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34127
* Fix multiplayer duration by having it set on beatmap population. by @SoftieTechCat in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34175
* Improve user style selection UX based on local beatmap state by @smoogipoo in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34206
* Fix failed to load beatmap detail host by deleted user by @EYHN in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34169
* Bring back minimal debug settings by @smoogipoo in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34221
* Write only fixed release streams back to config by @smoogipoo in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34225
* Improve safety of external skin edit operation in several scenarios by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34205
* Make online play results not request leaderboard on failed submission by @smoogipoo in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34209
* Fix android builds losing awareness of their release stream by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34232
* Attempt to properly quantify the impact of mania Hard Rock / Easy mod application on overall difficulty by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34227
* Fix game not restarting after changing renderers by @Joehuu in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34239
* Add default multiplier for mania key mods by @smoogipoo in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/30506
* Add Bopomofo characters by @frenzibyte in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/33759
* Adjust song select spatial division one more time by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34260
* Allow beatmap cards' collapsible icon buttons to be accessible via context menu by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34264
* Fix crash when open changelog in offline by @EYHN in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34267
* Fix update manager throwing unhandled visible to users by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34276
* Update framework by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34278
* Add antialiasing to triangles in `MarkerVisualisation` by @EVAST9919 in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34280
* Fix failing to parse bundle version on iOS by @smoogipoo in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34300
* Fix song select v2 not updating activity to choosing beatmap by @Joehuu in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34298
* Fix beatmap update button restarting animation at every hover by @emkodelirdi in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34283
* Support (un)favouriting beatmap sets from song select by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34282
* Fix incorrect grammar in editor's verify section by @shinmorisawa in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34305
* Fix date-based grouping modes handling months incorrectly by @frenzibyte in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34310
* Fix beatmap set cover not loading at screen edges by @EYHN in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34306
* Add initial support for filtering by user tags in song select by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34231
* Add grouping separator to PP display in user profile overlay (also display decimal value in tooltip) by @frenzibyte in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34014
* Fix playlists leaderboard provider not being thread safe by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34316
* Animate heart icon when favouriting beatmaps by @minetoblend in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34322
* Fix editor background not updating in certain scenarios by @chris-ehmann in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34290
* Add verify check for lowest diff drain/play time requirements by @Hiviexd in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34181
* Store pause timestamps to scores by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34058
* Remove iOS workload rollbacks by @smoogipoo in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34335
* Fix beatmap offset control potentially reporting negative zero by @JackArmstrong22 in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/33530
* Fix iOS bundle version by @smoogipoo in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34345
* Fix present beatmap audio start at the preview point by @EYHN in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34353
* Revert "Update framework" by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34372
* Refactor song select panel background layout and rendering by @frenzibyte in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34312
* Add more SFX to SSv2 components by @nekodex in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34389
* Fix back-to-top button handling input outside itself by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34384
* Expand scrollbar input area for song select carousel by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34383
* Add back "edit" context menu item on set panel headers by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34380
* Fix mods from mod button still visible when revealing background by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34386
* Add `Hits Per Play` statistic to profile overlay by @diquoks in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34407
* Change song select grouping to be divided into 10 BPM groups by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34381
* Adjust panel flashing to feel more in time by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34409
* Change standalone beatmap panel to display status of individual difficulty by @chris-ehmann in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34375
* Add verify check for inconsistent metadata by @Hiviexd in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34368
* Account for almost concurrent case in concurrent objects check by @Hiviexd in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34371
* Add ability to import all files from a directory to import files dialog by @Czer0xx in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34303
* SSv2: Add ability to sort local scores by metrics other than total score by @dani211e in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/33871
* Fix song select favourite button getting stuck spinning if operation failed by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34410
* Update menu tip design by @vatei in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34417
* Fully localise SSV2 by @diquoks in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34074
* Display user avatar and content in chat notifications, also display avatar in friend presence notifications by @frenzibyte in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34001
* Always allow a map's user-tags to be read by @NotStirred in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/33544
* Add divisor colour for 5,7,9 snaps by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34418
* Add `Moving Fast` mod to osu!catch by @CloneWith in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/33688
* Avoid triggering a velopack update when handling associations or other custom arguments by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34427
* Adjust stereo shift effects for UI sounds to be less extreme by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34430
* Backpopulate user tag data using `online.db` by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34346
* Fix leaderboard SFX delegates not being cleared in some cases where scores are hidden by @nekodex in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34448
* Unify display logic of beatmap difficulty attributes across usages by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34432
* Add tooltip states for the `FavouriteButton` on SSV2 by @diquoks in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34452
* Fix beatmap carousel refreshing when user selects "Manage Collections…" from dropdown by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34451
* Add support for grouping beatmaps by collections by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34459
* Ensure scores are re-fetched with correct criteria on re-entering song select by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34450
* Fix missing disposal of Realm subscription by @smoogipoo in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34475
* Fix intermittent update manager test, skin editor test not working on macOS by @smoogipoo in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34478
* Fix gameplay leaderboard showing for a split second on entering gameplay by @frenzibyte in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34499
* Don't require pixel precision to expand editor toolboxes by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34492
* Calculate multiplayer room difficulty range based only on non-expired items when the room is open by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34464
* Fix leaderboard wedge updating scores in non-update thread by @frenzibyte in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/33809
* Always show "sort" dropdown but disable in cases it doesn't (yet) work by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34498
* Fade music back in when returning from song select from gameplay by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34496
* Display extended information about effect of beatmap attributes on gameplay in tooltip when hovering by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34462
* Avoid reveal background triggering when more than left mouse button is involved by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34501
* Fix clicks propagating through personal best score area by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34491
* Update beatmap online statuses when the set is selected in song select by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34419
* Fix `PanelUpdateBeatmapButton`'s tooltip display by @diquoks in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34504
* Distinguish between set-level and difficulty-specific checks in verify screen by @Hiviexd in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34467
* Add verify check for inconsistent timing control points by @Hiviexd in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34465
* Prevent playing sliding sounds in hold notes when beatmap is not converted by @frenzibyte in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34500
* Add verify check for inconsistent osu!taiko barline omission by @Hiviexd in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34517
* Fix clicking beatmap carousel group & set headers not working (or crashing) during a filter by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34525
* Fix update thread stutters upon completion of online beatmap lookup in song select by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34516
* Always use MessagePack to talk to spectator server by @smoogipoo in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34538
* Add verify check for missing genre/language tags by @Hiviexd in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34532
* Small adjustments to timing and metadata verify checks by @Hiviexd in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34541
* Fix grid placement completely breaking selection in certain scenarios by @frenzibyte in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34526
* Add verify check for inconsistent settings by @Hiviexd in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34540
* Fix potential update failures due to not handling required velopack callbacks by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34549
* Fix various issues around metadata cache handling by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34550
* Implement "my maps" grouping mode by @frenzibyte in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34539
* Update 16x16 icon file with more modern design by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34551
* Fix inconsistent localisation string in replay key bindings by @Esnos33 in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34553
* Allow exporting logs on iOS by @frenzibyte in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34566
* Arrange `SortMode` in alphabetical order by @diquoks in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34573
* Allow enabling osu!mania touch overlay on non-mobile platforms by @AeroKoder in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34426
* Implement new gameplay leaderboard design by @frenzibyte in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34339
* Implement "rank achieved" grouping mode by @frenzibyte in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34548
* Fix keyboard selection being reset/invalidated more often than required by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34619
* Reduce number of realm subscription triggers from song select online lookups by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34620
* Fix "reveal background" triggering in one more case it shouldn't by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34624
* Add "Argon" unstable rate counter by @Hiviexd in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34592
* Fix selection being finalised immediately on beatmap updates arriving by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34625
* Refactor `BeatmapVerifierContext` by @Hiviexd in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34584
* Fix incorrect status colour for DnD users by @smoogipoo in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34644
* Calculate multiplayer room difficulty range based only on non-expired items by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34639
* Fix tags popover search functionality not always working by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34658
* Add support for specifying multiple user tag filters at once by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34640
* Fix navigating back and forth from beatmap submission settings screen crashing by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34659
* Fix song select crashing on beatmap with two difficulties of same online ID by @frenzibyte in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/33558
* Made the user avatar square, in `UserAvatarNotification`. by @AeroKoder in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34533
* Ignore more potentially incorrect data from BASS by @peppy in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34657
* Add verify check for inconsistent video usage by @Hiviexd in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34651
* Refetch leaderboard when (slow) retrying a beatmap by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34662
* Show indicator in replay player once replay fails by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34628
* Add setting for adjusting beatmap offset automatically based on last play by @frenzibyte in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34612
* Support not equal operator in song select search by @Valerus9 in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34568
* Fix a bunch of issues with replay fail indicator by @bdach in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34676
* Force Xcode 16.4 on CI by @smoogipoo in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34682

## New Contributors
* @SoftieTechCat made their first contribution in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34175
* @emkodelirdi made their first contribution in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34283
* @JackArmstrong22 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/33530
* @Czer0xx made their first contribution in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34303
* @dani211e made their first contribution in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/33871
* @vatei made their first contribution in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34417
* @NotStirred made their first contribution in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/33544
* @Esnos33 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34553
* @AeroKoder made their first contribution in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34426
* @Valerus9 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/34568

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ppy/osu/compare/2025.710.0-lazer...2025.816.0-lazer

news.title: osu!mania 4K World Cup 2025: Finals Recap
news.caption: The final bout is near! Heavy is the crown to burden a king, but heavier is the path to the MWC 4K throne.

news.title: osu! World Cup 2025: Registrations Now Open!
news.caption: It's that time of the year once again. Prepare your banners, warm up your fingers, and get ready to cheer for your country as we unveil the 16th edition of the osu! World Cup!

news.title: The State of Ranked: Survey Results
news.caption: Vox populi, vox Dei.

news.title: Project Loved: Eight Years / September 2025
news.caption: We made it through yet another earth orbit — happy 8th birthday to Project Loved!

news.title: Community Mentorship Program Fall 2025 Signups Now Open
news.caption: The 31st cycle of the Community Mentorship Program is upon us! Get ready to delve deep into the world of mapping, modding, or storyboarding.

news.title: Jaye's One Key Event 4: The Great Escape
news.caption: Only one button required?! That's right, the largest 1-key competition is back again for another year of shenanigans and tomfoolery!

news.title: osu!mania 4K World Cup 2025: Semifinals Recap
news.caption: While the tournament enters its final spurt, we're steadily reaching the peak of osu!mania 4K competition. Join us, as we retell this week's epic, now with an extra side of jam!

news.title: New Featured Artist: Xeon Diversity
news.caption: Some osu! players click circles, some osu! players create circles to be clicked, and some osu! players like Xeon Diversity create music for the rest of the circle-clicking chain.
